scripts.build:parallel: yarn run pipeline:build:types && yarn workspaces foreach -Apt --exclude @swflcoders/types run build
scripts.build: echo 'Building all packages...' && yarn run pipeline:build:types && echo 'Building backend...' && yarn workspace @swflcoders/backend run build:lambda && echo 'Building frontend...' && yarn workspace @swflcoders/frontend run build && echo 'Building CDK...' && yarn workspace @swflcoders/cdk run build
scripts.clean: yarn workspaces foreach --all run clean || true && rm -rf node_modules/ yarn.lock .pnp.* .yarn/install-state.gz .yarn/cache
scripts.pipeline:test:integ: echo 'Running integration tests...' && yarn workspace @swflcoders/integ test
scripts.pipeline:test:e2e: echo 'Running E2E tests...' && yarn workspace @swflcoders/e2e test
